articles.author: Stuart Lau
articles.title: North Korean troops are now in Kursk to help Russia, NATO confirms - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Pyongyang alarms the West by seeking to assist Vladimir Putin in retaking territory from Ukraine.
articles.content: "I can confirm that North Korean troops have been sent to Russia and that North Korean military units have been deployed to the Kursk region," Rutte told reporters, soon after a meeting with a senior… [+1055 chars]

articles.author: Monica Raymunt
articles.title: VW Eyes Closing Three German Factories in Cost-Cutting Push - Bloomberg
articles.description: Volkswagen AG plans to close at least three factories in Germany as Europe’s biggest automaker tries to slash expenses to become more competitive.
articles.content:
Volkswagen AG plans to close at least three factories in Germany as Europes biggest automaker tries to slash expenses to become more competitive.
